name: One additional upper-division course taught in Spanish, in the Department of Spanish and Portuguese.
Residence Requirement for the Spanish/English Bilingual Education Minor

child.name: HUMAN 52/EDUC 52, EDUC 101, EDUC 107, EDUC 124, and at least one upper-division Spanish course must be completed successfully at UCI.

By petition, the upper-division Spanish course may be taken through the UC Education Abroad Program, provided course content is approved in advance by the appropriate undergraduate studies advisor or department chair.
